Class Transaction

  • java.lang.Object
    • Transaction

  • public class Transaction
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    scottfloam and pratikkarnik

    Transaction

    The Transaction class keeps track of the Transaction details. It holds information such as whether it is blocked, how long it has been running, the id of the Transaction, and the Variable(s) corresponding to that Transaction. In addition, it also keeps a log of its Operation(s).

      • getAge

        public java.lang.Integer getAge()
        getAge: gets the age of a Transaction Note, the age is incremented by one when a new Transaction begins. Thus, older Transaction(s) have smaller ages.
        Returns:
        the age of a Transaction
